projects.title: RowStream
projects.subtitle: React Native / Node.js / TypeScript / ElasticSearch
projects.description: Mobile application to track rowing data and remotely collaborate with other rowers

projects.title: Challonger Approaching
projects.subtitle: Angular 8 / Node.js / Challonge API
projects.description: Data aggregation web application built to help track long-term tournament results/rankings (primarily intended for Super Smash Bros. Melee). Try it out over here!

projects.title: Senior Design Project: Speech Prep Pal
projects.subtitle: Java / Android SDK / Google Cloud Platform APIs
projects.description: Worked on a team of 4 (plus 2 Google mentors) to develop an Android application aimed at honing a user’s speaking patterns through machine learning technology. Features include: video recording and playback, script accuracy detection through GCP speech-to-text API and Google’s Diff-Match-Patch API.

projects.title: Where's Everybody At?'
projects.subtitle: Angular 7 / Firebase / Heroku
projects.description: Worked on a team of 3 to create a lightweight web application to create/join current study groups around campus. As this was our final for a course in human computer interaction, we developed this project with an emphasis on user-centered design and iterated on our prototype throughout several rounds of user feedback/testing.

projects.title: Warcraft II Website
projects.subtitle: Angular 7 / Node.js / MongoDB
projects.description: Quarter-long, team-based project for ECS160: Software Engineering. Features implemented: JWT-based user authentication, real-time messaging system using Socket.io and RxJS, map rendering, file uploads/downloads,friends system, and email verification.

projects.title: Sudoku Puzzle Generator/Solver
projects.subtitle: HTML / CSS / JavaScript
projects.description: Random sudoku puzzle generator and solver utilizing a simple recursive algorithm. Check it out here.
